landing.subText: \{{city}} The Click is a new approach in the fight against litter. Everyone can participate, any time, anywhere. Via the free app, you scan your own food and drinks packaging or litter you pick up while out and about. We reward your good behaviour with virtual Circular UCoins, which you can exchange for all kinds of rewards from our partners. We are creating a lasting change in behaviour and making sure that litter becomes a thing of the past.
home.ask: Ask Merchant for a QR code & pay with Ucoins!
home.find: Find local merchants by clicking on the map!

screens.login.title: Login
screens.login.fields.stayLoggedIn.label: Stay logged in
screens.login.text.error: Oops, we don’t recognise that email address & password combination. Please ensure spellings are correct & your email address is registered.
screens.register.title: Sign Up
screens.register.details: Please enter your information to register for The Click.
screens.register.terms: I have read & agree to the <0>Terms of Use</0> & <1>Privacy Policy.</1>
screens.register.missingTerms: You must confirm that you have read and agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy to continue.
screens.register.newsletter: I would like to receive newsletters by mail (optional).
screens.register.error: Oops! Your details are already registered. Please login or sign up with a different email address.
screens.register.success.title: Success!
screens.register.success.text1: Thank you for signing up for The Click! You will receive an email with a one-time password soon.
screens.register.success.text2: In the unlikely event that you do not receive an email, please check your spam folder, or click to resend.
screens.forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
screens.forgotPassword.details: No problem! Enter your e-mail address & we’ll send you a link to reset your password.
screens.forgotPassword.text.response: If this email address exists, you will receive a link via email to reset your password. Didn’t receive the email? Please check your spam folder, click below to resend the email or try another email address.
screens.confirmPassword.title: Change Password
screens.confirmPassword.details: Please create a new password below.
screens.activeAccount.title: Complete Your Account
screens.activeAccount.details: Please enter your new password below.
screens.activeAccount.successView.title: Success
screens.activeAccount.successView.text1: Your account information has been successfully updated.
screens.activeAccount.successView.text2: You can review & update your account information from your My Profile page.

screens.scan.modal.recognised.title: Litter Recognised
screens.scan.modal.recognised.subtitle: We recognised this piece of litter.
screens.scan.modal.recognised.promise: I promise that this piece of litter is being sorted correctly.
screens.scan.modal.unrecognised.title: Litter Not Recognised!
screens.scan.modal.unrecognised.subtitle: We did not recognise this piece of litter.
screens.scan.modal.unrecognised.instruct: Please provide us with more information about this litter.
screens.scan.modal.unrecognised.promise: I promise that this piece of litter is being sorted correctly.
screens.scan.modal.manual.title: Photo successful!
screens.scan.modal.manual.subtitle: Thank you for taking a picture of this litter. Once submitted, it can take up to 48 hours to verify your item and receive your Ucoins.
screens.scan.modal.manual.instructions: Please provide us with more information about this litter.
screens.scan.modal.manual.promise: I promise that this piece of litter is being sorted correctly.
screens.scan.modal.thankyou.title: Thank you!
screens.scan.modal.thankyou.subtitle: We will now verify your item.
screens.scan.modal.thankyou.instructions: You will receive your Ucoins within 48 hours.
screens.scan.status.scanning: Looking for barcode...If the litter you found does not have a barcode, press the camera button to take a photo
screens.scan.status.locationOff: Oops! Your location services are turned off. Please turn on your location services to continue.
screens.scan.status.outsideGeofence: You are outside of the geofence! Please check the map to find the nearest supported area...
screens.scan.status.tooManyItems: Oops! It looks like you've scanned too many items too quickly! Please try again soon.
screens.scan.status.noCamera: Oops! You haven't given permission to use your camera. Please allow access to your camera to continue.

screens.map.plogging.instructions: Press the Start button and start your route. Walking, running or cycling while cleaning up litter. Win win for you and the planet.
